title: Color Game
author: Ricardo Moreira
body:
# **What it is?**

A game made with Javascript. It's from a tutorial and it was already my own version made [here](). 



## What I learned?

* DOM Manipulation
* Loops
* Functions
* Keyword this
* Event Listener
* Conditionals
* Arrays and arrays iterations
* RGB Colors

## Links

* [Project page](https://colorquiz.netlify.app/)
* [GitHub page](https://github.com/mugas/colorfullgame)
